categories: Category:Shadows of the Empire Planets Guide fiction

nodes.text: A Most Deadly Hunt is a roleplaying adventure outline in the September 1996 Shadows of the Empire Planets Guide, published by West End Games for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game as part of the Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire multimedia project. As a sequel to the preceding two outlines, A Case of Mistaken Identities and An Invitation to Defect, the adventure tasks Rebel players with capturing two wild krak'jya beasts so that a Bothan clan can add them to their zoo and thus increase their status within Bothan society.
